Title: UI Controllers
Description:
UI Controllers is a library of WPF enables controls to making it easier to add more forms of user input to an application.

For starters these are multi key gestures, mouse gestures and speech.
HomeWiki:
UI Controllers


This project contains a library of different UI Controllers for WPF projects.

Currently it contains classes for Multi-Key stroke gestures, Mouse Gestures, Speech and Gaze.

The Gaze recognition is in alpha. It does eye recognition, face recognition, eye tracking, face tracking, gaze click, and eye blink clicking.

- Future development wishes are:
- Pupil Recognition and tracking
- WPF controls
- gaze mouse control
- Gaze gesture recognition
